Test Name: VDRL Test (Venereal Disease Research Laboratory) on Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect reagin antibodies in spinal fluid indicative of syphilitic infection.
Container: Sterile container for CSF (post-lumbar puncture collection tube)
Equipment: VDRL antigen, sterile glass slides, micropipettes, mechanical rotating device (180 rpm), light microscope (100Ã—), humidified hood
